question: Which among the following is/are the schemes or programmes for welfare and development of minorities?
explanation:
Ministry of Minority Affairs implements various schemes and programmes for the welfare of minorities which are as follows -
1. NayaSavera, a scheme which aims to provide free coaching to students belonging to economically weaker sections of minority communities for competitive examinations.
2. Nai Udaan, a scheme to support for students clearing Prelims by UPSC, SPSC and SSC.
3. Pradhan Mantri Jan Vikas Karyakram (PMJVK) is implemented for the benefits of the people from all sections of the society in identified Areas for development of infrastructure projects with emphasis on education, skill , health sectors etc.
